title: I Got a Random Skin From Riot?
body:
So, today I got a mystery gift from Riot. I didn't know what it was, but assumed it was a skin. Wat. I got Nurse Akali, and I know for a FACT I never bought this, because I bought Crimson Akali during the short  period of her being re-released. Akali has the second most mastery points out of all of my champions. I have French Maid Nidalee (my highest) Riot, what was this for? I took part in the Alpha Client. I'm really lost - Nurse Akali doesn't even show up in my shop history. (kinda irrelevant, but I would have preferred Frejlord Taliyah :P) So, can anyone from riot confirm why or how this happened? Thank you,

~Seal

replies.body: I see that you have Nurse Akali, but it was obtained back in September.  Are these notifications happening in the updated client?  I wonder if it might be a bug, since this recent patch enabled new content notifications.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look and determine if we're seeing the same things as you, and what might be causing it.  We'll reply back asap!
